content:
I'm happy to help! However, I need to clarify that I don't know which city you're in, so I can't provide specific recommendations. Could you please tell me the name of your city or region?

Regarding your question, a natural history museum can be a great choice! They often have a wide range of exhibits that can appeal to people with different interests. You can expect to see exhibits on topics like dinosaurs, ancient civilizations, mammals, and much more. Natural history museums can be a great way to learn something new and have a fun, interactive experience with your partner.

If you're looking for something different from the Modern Art Museum, a natural history museum could be a great contrast. Just make sure to check the museum's website to see what exhibits are currently on display and plan your visit accordingly.

Once you share your city, I can try to provide more specific recommendations!
